channel.title: Latest from Android Central

item.title: Nothing confirms Headphone (a) launch with bold yellow design and lower price
item.description: Nothing’s Headphone (a) lands March 5 with a bold yellow design and big battery focus, making it an easy entry into the brand’s ecosystem without sacrificing style or value.

item.title: Samsung’s most cohesive Unpacked in years sets the stage for the Galaxy S26. Less filler, more focus.
